EmailTemplate.subject: Super Early Bird Registration ends June 30th
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Super Early Bird Registration ends June 30! REGISTER NOW! <http://www.springone2gx.com> Nearly 75% of the agenda is live!
Much of the content program has been determined, lots of great sessions lined up. Check our website <http://www.springone2gx.com> for speaker and session updates, and mark your calendar now!
FEATURED SESSION with BEN HALE
Creating REST-ful, Hypermedia based micro services with Spring Boot
As data-driven applications become ubiquitous, the services that provide the data are proliferating. As teams become responsible for more and more of these services, it becomes critical that they be designed and implemented in a way that is as lightweight as possible. This session will cover how to design micro-services as RESTful APIs and implement them with minimal code using Spring Boot. It will focus on API design using REST and HATEOAS, with live coding progressing from a tweet-length implementation all the way to a full-fledged app running in the cloud.
TRAINING DISCOUNT - TWO-DAY IMMERSION
Huge Discount on Immersion Training at the show!
If you select a registration package that includes the $200 two-day Immersion Training, you will be contacted to select one of the three options. You must attend only one of the Immersion Trainings for September 7-8, 2014. Day 2 training on September 8, 2014 will end before the official start of activities for SpringOne 2GX 2014.
- Developing Applications for the Cloud, Immersion Training (Sunday & Monday - Sep 7 & 8, 2014) - Pivotal Cloud Foundry for Operators, Immersion Training (Sunday & Monday - Sep 7 & 8, 2014) - Hadoop for Developers, Immersion Training (Sunday & Monday - Sep 7 & 8, 2014)
This is a one-of-a-kind conference for application developers, solution and data architects who develop business applications, create multi-device aware web applications, process vast quantities of enterprise data, design cloud architectures, and manage high performance infrastructure. The sessions are specifically tailored for developers using the hugely popular open source Spring IO Projects, Groovy & Grails, CloudFoundry, Hadoop and Tomcat technologies. Whether you're building mission-critical web or business applications, crunching huge amounts of distributed data, or designing the next killer cloud application, SpringOne 2GX will keep you up to date with the latest enterprise technology.
Featuring presentations delivered by development leads, committers, and published authors, it's the ideal place to obtain critical skills to help you design, build and run tomorrow's software solutions. Plus you'll meet and learn from open source leaders <https://2014.event.springone2gx.com/presenters> who drive innovation for these technologies.
See you there,
The Spring Team at Pivotal <http://www.gopivotal.com>
